entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:40 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 09:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
